name: Box fight (GGJ 2015)
description:
supported keyboard layouts : FR, DE, US
Made for the Global Game Jam

- Local multiplayer with one keyboard
- The winner of the preceding level can choose the next on by moving to the chosen level button and pressing space
- Controls to move and to shoot indicated in the start menu

  • Hold : the goal is to hold the pink box the longer possible. You can take the box from th other player by running into it, or you can make him lose the box by shooting it
  • Push : push your box on the other side of the screen by shooting it! you can also shoot your ennemy's box to prevent him from winning ;)
  • Shoot : shoot on the ennemy's box to detroy it, you can also heal your own box by shooting it

2 persons team
Still a few bugs present

Global game jam game page : http://globalgamejam.org/2015/games/box-fight
